48  package org.jaxen.function.ext;
49  
50  import java.util.List;
51  
52  import org.jaxen.Context;
53  import org.jaxen.Function;
54  import org.jaxen.FunctionCallException;
55  import org.jaxen.Navigator;
56  import org.jaxen.function.StringFunction;
57  
58  /***
59   * <p><code><i>boolean</i> ends-with(<i>string</i>,<i>string</i>)</code>
60   *
61   * @author mark wilson (markw @ wilsoncom.de)
62   */
63  public class EndsWithFunction implements Function
64  {
65  
66      public Object call(Context context,
67                         List args) throws FunctionCallException
68      {
69          if (args.size() == 2)
70          {
71              return evaluate( args.get(0),
72                               args.get(1),
73                               context.getNavigator() );
74          }
75  
76          throw new FunctionCallException( "ends-with() requires two arguments." );
77      }
78  
79      public static Boolean evaluate(Object strArg,
80                                     Object matchArg,
81                                     Navigator nav)
82      {
83          String str   = StringFunction.evaluate( strArg,
84                                                  nav );
85  
86          String match = StringFunction.evaluate( matchArg,
87                                                  nav );
88  
89          return ( str.endsWith(match)
90                   ? Boolean.TRUE
91                   : Boolean.FALSE
92                   );
93      }
94  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
